name: DependencyCheck
description: OWASP Dependency Check task for Azure Pipelines
author: jack-education

inputs.name: enableDatabaseMaintenance
inputs.label: Enable maintenance of vulnerability files in storage account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to enable maintenance of vulnerability files in storage account.

inputs.name: databaseSasUri
inputs.label: Shared Access Signature Uri for database of vulnerabilities
inputs.helpMarkDown: Shared Access Signature for blob container of storage account that contains versioned vulnerability databases: files odc.mv.db and jsrepository.json

inputs.name: sharedKey
inputs.label: Shared Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Log Analytics workspace shared key

inputs.name: enableSelfHostedDatabase
inputs.label: Enable self hosted database
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select to enable self hosted database of vulnerabilities for this task.

inputs.name: databaseEndpoint
inputs.label: Database endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Database endpoint that has files odc.mv.db and jsrepository.json, eg. https://<storage account name>.blob.core.windows.net/<blob container name>

inputs.name: excludedScanPathPatterns
inputs.label: Excluded scan path patterns
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path patterns to exclude from scan for vulnerabiities
